testcase.name: Shopping_Scenario
testcase.system-out: Given user should go to URL "http://automationexercise.com".................passed Then verify that you are in home page.......................................passed When click on sign up button................................................passed And Enter name and email and click on SignUp Button.........................passed And Fill all details in Signup and create account...........................passed Then Verify ACCOUNT CREATED! and click Continue button......................passed And Verify Logged in as username at top....................................passed When Add products to cart...................................................passed And Click Cart button.......................................................passed Then Verify that cart page is displayed.....................................passed When Click Proceed To Checkout..............................................passed Then Verify that the delivery address and billing address are same..........passed When Click logout button....................................................passed Then Verify that user logged out............................................passed And Close the application...................................................passed
